data.text: @_tsholo__ Aw no bbz you just had your arm chilling dead all day ? It should be better by Friday with the movements. Get better soon please!
@farie I should’ve iced mine yesterday. I didn’t move it at all today and it’s still really sore. I’ll try move it more. Thank you!!
@_tsholo__ Just 2 days for me. I made sure I moved it frequently and iced it for about 30mins on the first day
